item.title: Proxmox VS Hyper-V - Which Hypervisor Should You Choose?
item.description: Trying to decide which Hypervisor is best for you? Find out in this detailed comparison of Proxmox and Hyper-V inlcuding GPU passthrough capabilities.

item.title: How to Install Synology NAS on Proxmox
item.description: This guide will walk you through setting up a Synology NAS on your Proxmox server at home.
